name: Her Chili Oil Tears
description:
Based on my personal zine Chili Oil Tears, a zine about my struggle with bottling my emotions until the point that my tears would quite literally burst from my eyes. The title Chili Oil Tears comes from the way how when I cried, the tears felt like hot oil running down my face and how they seemed to stain everything that touched them.

This was made for CDM 75 SQ2022
